titleStmt.title: The difference of that call of God to the ministry which is by the power of his own gift and measure of life, revealed, and of that, which is received of man, and taught by man, as is manifest by these two severall calls, herein declared, with several principals relating to this second call, answered / by Richard Hubberthorn.
titleStmt.author: Hubberthorn, Richard, 1628-1662.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Cambridge University Library.
